name: Farm Yard Fun For Kids
description:
Farm Yard Fun For Kids

Great app for kids who love to play, you can move the farm yard animals around the screen and play with them as if you would on a real farm yard, you can also take a photo of your farm to share with your friends.

App Features:
It's FREE
Lots of Animals to play with
Can move all animals together, great with friends
3 Back Drops
Farm Yard memory matching game
HD photo gallery
And More....

Will keep kids entertained for hours and perfect as it's FREE

Produced by SlinkyApps.com

Please check out our other FREE kids apps

http://www.SlinkyApps.com
